function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-standardized data collection and terminology","Impact":"Data capture challenges and data gaps","Mitigation":"Standardizing data collection methods and terminologies","Technologies":"Data management and integration software","People":"Data scientists, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges of data sharing","Impact":"Attenuated research effect, data gaps","Mitigation":"Developing secure and standardized data sharing platforms","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure data sharing","People":"Data scientists, policy makers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Timely generation and dissemination of data","Impact":"Delayed public health decision making","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time data analysis and dissemination systems","Technologies":"Real-time analytics and communication tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations"}]}
